sys_metadata_link.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_include">
    <sys_script_include action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE">
        <access>package_private</access>
        <active>true</active>
        <api_name>global.VAOneExtendDefaultCallback</api_name>
        <caller_access/>
        <client_callable>false</client_callable>
        <description>Default callback script OneExtend calls when receiving a response for OneExtend calls originating from Virtual Agent</description>
        <name>VAOneExtendDefaultCallback</name>
        <script><![CDATA[var VAOneExtendDefaultCallback = Class.create();
VAOneExtendDefaultCallback.prototype = {
    initialize: function() {
    },
	
	processCompleted: function(response) {
		sn_cs.VASystemObject.oneExtendCompleted(response);
	},
	
	processErrored: function(response) {
		sn_cs.VASystemObject.oneExtendErrored(response);
	},
	
	processCancelled: function(response) {
		sn_cs.VASystemObject.oneExtendCancelled(response);
	},

    type: 'VAOneExtendDefaultCallback'
};]]></script>
        <sys_class_name>sys_script_include</sys_class_name>
        <sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by>
        <sys_created_on>2022-09-14 15:20:53</sys_created_on>
        <sys_id>2d962d7353b111103296ddeeff7b12b6</sys_id>
        <sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count>
        <sys_name>VAOneExtendDefaultCallback</sys_name>
        <sys_package display_value="Glide Conversation Server" source="com.glide.cs">ad7df0203c75311068bcf327dfe37f75</sys_package>
        <sys_policy/>
        <sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope>
        <sys_update_name>sys_script_include_2d962d7353b111103296ddeeff7b12b6</sys_update_name>
        <sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by>
        <sys_updated_on>2022-09-14 15:20:53</sys_updated_on>
    </sys_script_include>
</record_update>
